creditline: Courtesy of the artist and Goodman Gallery, South Africa
description: black and white photograph of a woman with a hose in front of a tiny rectangular house; in the background are many power lines and a cemetery
title: Miriam Mazibuko waters the garden of her RDP house for which she waited eight years. It consists of one room. Her four children live with her in-laws. Extension 8, Far East Alexandra Township.
